    • Method Detail

      • displayQuestion

        public UserBean displayQuestion(int q_ID)
        Fetch data from "survey.question" to display. specific data to be displayed by comparing column "id" from the question table. copy data from database table into bean class variables by using setter method from the UserBean class
        Returns:
        object of UserBean class display selected question by comparing the id

      • addQues

        public void addQues(UserBean userBean)
        Insert "survey_id & question_name" into "survey.question" table. survey_id is the foreign key of "survey.survey_sections" in question table. one to many relationship between tables "survey.survey_sections" & "survey.question" copy data from UserBean class "getter methods" and save into "survey.question" table. insert user selected data into the database.

      • addOptions

        public void addOptions(UserBean userBean)
        Insert or replace data into "survey.question_options" table. question_id is the foreign key in question_option table. one to one relationship between tables "survey.question_options" & "survey.question". copy data from UserBean class "getter methods" and save into "survey.question_option" table. insert user selected data into "survey.question_options" including "question_id" of selected data.

      • removeQues

        public void removeQues(int userId)
        Delete data from "survey.question" table. use column "id" to specify "selected by user".

      • removeAns

        public void removeAns(int userId)
        Delete data from "survey.answers" table.

      • removeQuesbySID

        public void removeQuesbySID(int userId)
        Delete data from "survey.question" table. All data deleted against the specific "survey.survey_sections.question".

      • editQues

        public void editQues(UserBean userBean)
        Update data from "survey.question" table. Data will be updated against the specific selected question. Compared data with column "question_name" and "id".

      • getAllQues

        public java.util.List getAllQues()
        Fetch data from "survey.question" to display. copy data from database table into bean class variables by using setter method from the UserBean class
        Returns:
        data in List display all questions column "survey.question"

      • getQuesById

        Returns:
        object of UserBean class display selected question by comparing the id

        Returns:
        object of UserBean class display selected question_options by comparing the id

      • addSurvey

        public void addSurvey(UserBean userBean)
        Insert column "section_name" into "survey.survey_sections" table. copy data from UserBean class "getter methods" and save into "survey.survey_sections.section_name" table. insert user selected data into the database.

      • removeSurvey

        public void removeSurvey(int userId)
        Delete data from "survey.survey_sections" table. use column "id" to specify "selected by user".

      • editSurvey

        public void editSurvey(UserBean userBean)
        Update data from "survey.survey_sections" table. Data will be updated against the specific selected survey. Compared data with column "section_name" and "id".

        data in List. display all Survey column "survey.survey_sections"

      • addAnswer

        public void addAnswer(UserBean userBean)
        Insert "question_id & answer_numeric" into "survey.answers" table. question_id is the foreign key of "survey.answers". one to many relationship between tables "survey.question" & "survey.answers". copy data from UserBean class "getter methods" and save into "survey.question" table. insert user selected data into the database.

      • data_pieChart_option1

        public UserBean data_pieChart_option1(int UserId)
        Fetch data from "survey.answers" to display. specific data to be displayed by comparing column "question_id" and "answer_numeric" from the answers table. count total numbers of data entries and return the result for Graph display "graph_display.jsp" copy data from database table "survey.answers" into bean class variables by using setter method from the UserBean class
        Returns:
        object of UserBean class display selected answers by comparing the question_id and answer_numeric
